summary:
Zurich is Switzerland's biggest city and the capital of Zurich canton. It's by Lake Zurich in the north-central part of the country. As of January 2023, about 443,000 people live there. Zurich is a major transport hub with the busiest airport and railway station in Switzerland.

The city has a long history, dating back over 2,000 years to Roman times. It became an important center during the Protestant Reformation in the 1500s. Today, Zurich is known for its finance, culture, and art. It has many museums and a famous theater, the Schauspielhaus ZÃ¼rich.
title: Zurich
